name: dereuromark/cakephp-audit-stash
description: Flexible and rock solid audit log tracking plugin for cakephp

suggest.cakephp/elastic-search: The default persister engine for audit-stash is elastic search and requires this plugin
suggest.friendsofcake/crud: audit-stash provides Crud Action classes for displaying audit logs
suggest.jfcherng/php-diff: For enhanced word-level diff rendering in AuditHelper (falls back to sebastian/diff if not installed)

scripts.stan-setup: cp composer.json composer.backup && composer require --dev phpstan/phpstan:^2.0.0 && mv composer.backup composer.json
